alert.note: Alert for Iowa (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 30 at 4:27PM CDT until April 30 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Milwaukee/Sullivan has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Iowa County in south central Wisconsin... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 426 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles west of Dodgeville, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Highland, Avoca, Cobb, Clyde, Blackhawk Lake Rec Area and Edmund. This includes the following Location The House on the Rock. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for south central Wisconsin. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for south central Wisconsin.
